about_the_game:
WELCOME TO THE DEMO PAGE!

his demo includes 2 levels! 3 different playable player ships and a variety of enemies.

we hope you enjoy it!

BrAInstorm is a high-stakes fast pace sci-fi Adventure that takes place in Dr. Kairo Mnemorix’s mind, the brilliant scientist who created Z.E.K.E, a super-intelligent AI destined to reshape the galaxy. 

Take the role of one of Dr. Kairo's daughters as you travel inside his mind to destroy the tumor that plagues him. Can you withstand the images of the mind while trying to save Dr. Kairo Mnemorix?

in this sci-fi shoot-em-up your task besides saving the Doctor is dodging and defeating the enemies that you'll face. with challenging bullet patterns and funky visuals this bullet hell is created to be confusing but fun to play.
